sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a pot over medium heat. 2. Add red curry paste and cook until fragrant. 3. Stir in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. 4. Add mixed vegetables and simmer until tender. 5. Season with fish sauce and brown sugar. 6. Stir in Thai basil leaves. 7. Serve hot over cooked jasmine rice.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Mixed Vegetables (500g, such as bell pep</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Thai Red Curry Vegetables</name> <nutrition>Calories: 300, Protein: 5g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 30g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Chop mixed vegetables into bite-sized pieces.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7c91d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afe9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
